question: What are the current trends in technology adoption within the healthcare industry?

subtasks.task: Identify the companies operating in the healthcare industry and their respective technology focus areas.
Analyze the technology stacks used by the identified healthcare companies to determine common technologies adopted across the industry.
Examine the IT trends specific to the healthcare sector to understand how these companies are integrating new technologies such as AI or IoT.
Gather data on social media engagement to see how healthcare companies are communicating their technology initiatives or trends to their audience.
Compile the findings into a report summarizing the technology adoption trends in the healthcare industry.
